modules.description: This module provides functions to convert OCaml values to and from BSON format using `Resto_json` encodings. It works with the `bson` type, which represents BSON documents, and supports serialization and deserialization of structured data. Concrete use cases include handling HTTP requests and responses in Tezos-related services that require BSON-encoded data.

This module provides functions to construct and manipulate JSON encodings for values used in RESTful service descriptions. It supports operations like mapping values through conversion functions, generating schemas, and defining structured data formats for requests and directory information. Concrete use cases include encoding service endpoints, request parameters, and directory structures into JSON with precise schemas.

This module provides functions to convert values to and from `Json_repr.Ezjsonm.value` using `Resto_json.Encoding.t` encodings. It operates directly on JSON values represented by the `Ezjsonm` type, enabling serialization and deserialization of structured data. Concrete use cases include encoding and decoding JSON payloads in a Tezos node's RPC system.

This module offers JSON and BSON serialization and conversion capabilities tailored for RESTful service definitions. It provides structured encodings for defining request and directory data formats, with direct support for `Json_repr.Ezjsonm.value` and `bson` types. It is used to encode and decode JSON and BSON payloads in Tezos node RPCs and related services.
